title: Savage Addiction - Novel Updates
tags: Arranged Marriage   Broken Engagement   Carefree Protagonist   Cute Protagonist   Engagement   Family Business   Marriage of Convenience   Modern Day   Short Story   Strong Love Interests   Wealthy Characters
author: 空菊
description:
Elegance and refinement are Ning You’s instincts.

He doesn’t like rude people, and furthermore can’t bear barbaric behavior.

An accident happened unexpectedly, he lost his way inside the forest at the border and was rudely carried on horse’s back by a wild rough man. It was only then that he realized the barbaric he had perceived before was not called uncivilized.>
